name: LetItSnow
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: let it snow
Developer Terms of Use
des: Let It Snow is a playful skill where Alexa will give you a line from the song, Let It Snow, no matter what you say to the skill. On devices with screens that support video, snow falls in flurries because, well, let it snow. Add a routine for Alexa to open the skill when you say 'Alexa, what's the weather?' to really set the mood this holiday season or play a jolly prank on your household members.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
